title: Cuban Contraband
description: From the critically acclaimed author of Blind Luck comes Cuban Contraband - the suspenseful thriller set against the backdrop of human trafficking. Kidnapping, sex slavery, strange bedfellows, and a few surprises make Cuban Contraband a great summer read!Retired FBI agent Alexander Christian is enjoying the good life in his Texas beach house. During a chance encounter, he learns of a young Cuban girl who was smuggled into the US and has gone missing. He has a feeling sheâ€™s become a victim of human trafficking and offers to look for her.To locate the missing girl, Christian must delve into the dark underworld of escort services, massage parlors, and seedy bars that are fronts for prostitution. He concocts a cover story and dives into the sex-slave gutter.After an exhaustive search, low on options, and when it looks like time is running out for the girl, Christian gets a tip from an unlikely source that could lead him to the missing teen. He follows the lead and what he finds will change his life forever.
author: Ben   Cooper
